channel.title: 2024 on NEU CTF Club
channel.description: Recent content in 2024 on NEU CTF Club

item.title: GM#2: Crypto Trail Pt. 2
item.description: Hi hackers! Join us on Monday 1/22 at 6pm for a part two to the crypto trail series!! Solve challenges that will lead you down a path, and you just mind find where X marks the spot to win prizes!

item.title: GM#1: Murder, Mystery, & CTFs
item.description: Hi hackers! We’re back and better than ever! Join us this Wednesday 1/10 for a Clue inspired murder mystery challenge. We need your help in catching the killer here on NEU’s campus.
